Get metadata for a BED file or BEDset

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_metadata.Rd

Get metadata for a BED file or BEDset. Abort if not found or id is not not 32 characters

bb_metadata(api, id, full = FALSE)

Arguments

api

API object of BEDbase created from BEDbase()

id

integer() record or object identifier

full

logical() (default FALSE) include full record with stats, files, and metadata

Value

list() metadata

Examples

api <- BEDbase()

ex_bed <- bb_example(api, "bed")
bb_metadata(api, ex_bed$id)
#> $name
#> [1] "Human_LnCaP_H3K9me3_R1881-16hr_Chinnaiyan"
#> 
#> $genome_alias
#> [1] "hg19"
#> 
#> $genome_digest
#> [1] "baa91c8f6e2780cfd8fd1040ff37f51c379947a2a4820d6c"
#> 
#> $bed_type
#> [1] "bed4+1"
#> 
#> $bed_format
#> [1] "bed"
#> 
#> $id
#> [1] "04c46b96264ef40bca93f03b10345da5"
#> 
#> $description
#> NULL
#> 
#> $submission_date
#> [1] "2024-04-09T21:49:22.425168Z"
#> 
#> $last_update_date
#> [1] "2024-04-09T21:49:22.425180Z"
#> 
#> $is_universe
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $license_id
#> [1] "DUO:0000042"
#> 
#> $stats
#> NULL
#> 
#> $plots
#> NULL
#> 
#> $files
#> NULL
#> 
#> $universe_metadata
#> NULL
#> 
#> $raw_metadata
#> NULL
#> 
#> $bedsets
#> list()
#> 

ex_bedset <- bb_example(api, "bedset")
bb_metadata(api, ex_bedset$id)
#> $id
#> [1] "gse246900"
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "gse246900"
#> 
#> $md5sum
#> [1] "ab910211c1b997df45d8072a742f32c4"
#> 
#> $statistics
#> NULL
#> 
#> $plots
#> NULL
#> 
#> $description
#> [1] "Data from [GEO GSE246900](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE246900)\nTET-mediated DNA demethylation influences histone enhancers H3K4me1 and H3K27ac in breast cancer"
#> 
#> $bed_ids
#> $bed_ids[[1]]
#> [1] "2e72871cd5eb7f33508b6ba8a401695f"
#> 
#> $bed_ids[[2]]
#> [1] "40dde5fd922804c4851822c0cceff27c"
#> 
#> $bed_ids[[3]]
#> [1] "4243dbf1e8c81e1004584b278471a4c0"
#> 
#> $bed_ids[[4]]
#> [1] "d6f44f6024f8969a915a2358a20eb3d6"
#> 
#> $bed_ids[[5]]
#> [1] "eb1db3a0f7f54d40aadfb58ca0e893cb"
#> 
#> $bed_ids[[6]]
#> [1] "f2695ae45fd6825ad41c015a83b3ecd0"
#> 
#>
